successes.title: Thimbleweed Park: A New Classic Point & Click Adventure!
successes.description: It’s like opening a dusty old desk drawer and finding an undiscovered LucasArts adventure game you’ve never played before.

Pledges.description: A Big Hearty Thanks™ and the inner warmth of knowing you made someone happy. Not as happy as $20, but still happy.
A digital copy of the amazing 2D point & click adventure game, Thimbleweed Park for Windows, Mac and/or Linux.

"I pirated Maniac Mansion and Monkey Island when I was a kid and I feel bad!" This reward tier instantly absolves you of all guilt and includes the Thimbleweed Park game. All subsequent tiers also include guilt absolution.
Digital Thimbleweed Park sound track, including liner notes and printable cassette tape and CD covers plus the game.
Get your name in the exclusive Thimbleweed Park in-game phone book (subject to our approval). Your name could be the solution to a puzzle. Plus game + soundtrack.
A PDF of the “Making Of Thimbleweed Park” art and game design book. Plus game + soundtrack + phone book.

We’ll send you an actual photo postcard of all the rewards you could have had if you just pledged a little more...hey for another $50 you could get the poster or t-shirt, sorry, but this crap’s expensive to print and ship (we did the math) and we want to use as much as possible to make the actual game. Plus game + soundtrack + phone book.

A glorious full size poster for Thimbleweed Park. In color! With images! And maybe some text! You'll want to proudly display this stunning poster for all your friends to see. Plus game + art pdf + soundtrack + phone book.
A Thimbleweed Park T-Shirt available in a variety of men’s and women's sizes, suitable to wear in casual and formal situations. Plus game + art pdf + soundtrack + phone book.

By popular demand! A collectors edition boxed copy of Thimbleweed Park without the frills of a t-shirt or poster, just a box and a manual, but it still recreates a happier time when software like this just came in boxes from stores. Plus game + art pdf + soundtrack + phone book.
A glorious full size Thimbleweed Park poster, but this one is signed by Gary Winnick and Ron Gilbert.  Plus two copies of the game + art pdf + t-shirt + soundtrack + phone book.

A glorious collectors edition boxed copy of Thimbleweed Park. Actually, it’s just a box and a manual, but it recreates a happier time when software like this just came in boxes from stores…. you know, boxes on shelves in stores… come on, you know… those square cardboard things… Plus (game x 2) + art pdf + t-shirt + signed poster + soundtrack + phone book.

Printed copy of “Making Of Thimbleweed Park” book you can put on your coffee table to proclaim to the world: I love adventure games!  Plus (game x 3) + art pdf + t-shirt + signed poster + box + soundtrack + phone book.

We’ll name the brand of one of the inventory items in the game after you and also create an artistic product logo for it (subject to our approval). For example: "Paul Tyma’s Floor Wax and Rat Poison - Cleans your Floors Shiny Bright and Kills Your Rats Shiny Dead"… Plus (game x 3) + art pdf + t-shirt + signed poster + box + art book + soundtrack + phone book.

We’ll recreate your likeness as the dead body from Thimbleweed Park in pixel art then you'll get a super high quality fancy-smancy one of a kind print. You’ll need to provide an appropriate photo (subject to our approval, no real corpses please).  Plus (game x 3) + art pdf + t-shirt + signed poster + box + book + soundtrack + phone book.
We’ll name one of the supporting characters in the game after you and model them after your likeness. Plus (game x 4) + art pdf + t-shirt + signed poster + box + book + soundtrack + phone book.

Handmade one-of-a-kind plushie of any character from Thimbleweed Park. Guaranteed to make your friends say: "What game is that from?" Plus (game x 5) + art pdf + t-shirt + signed poster + box + book + character naming + soundtrack + phone book.
